decision_reasoning: filing a complaint with the regulatory body is not required to reopen a claim based on incompetence
application_details: Basharat's claim was abandoned due to her consultant's failure. The Refugee Protection Division refused to reopen it, citing lack of complaint to the regulatory body
procedure_followed: Judicial review of the Refugee Protection Division's decision; Federal Court analyzed applicable rules and legal precedents
result_of_case: Federal Court allowed the judicial review, remitting the matter for redetermination by a different decision maker
cause_of_action: Immigration consultant's failure to file Basharat's refugee claim and communicate hearing details led to its abandonment
